title: Benefits: exemption for employer-supported childcare: structure of guidance: contents

details.body:
The guidance is set out in blocks as follows:
**Tax years up to the year ended 5 April 2005**
[EIM21902](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21902) Employer supported childcare: summary of exemptions before and after 5 April 2005
[EIM21905](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21905) Exemption for workplace nurseries to 5 April 2005: overview
[EIM21910](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21910) Meaning of childcare to 5 April 2005
[EIM21915](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21915) Premises provided by the employer: conditions to be met to 5 April 2005
[EIM21920](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21920) Joint provision with other employers: further conditions to 5 April 2005
[EIM21925](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21925) Responsibility for financing to 5 April 2005
[EIM21930](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21930) Responsibility for management to 5 April 2005
[EIM21940](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21940) Conditions relating to the child to 5 April 2005
[EIM21945](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21945) Exclusion where premises used as private dwelling to 5 April 2005
[EIM21950](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21950) Registration requirements to 5 April 2005
[EIM21960](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21960) Requests for pre-transaction rulings
**Commercially marketed nursery schemes to 5 April 2005**
[EIM21970](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21970) Commercially marketed nursery schemes to 5 April 2005
[EIM21971](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21971) Tax consequences of workplace nursery schemes
[EIM21972](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21972) Dealing with approaches from employers
[EIM21973](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21973) Dealing with disputes
**Changes introduced with effect from 6 April 2005**
[EIM21990](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21990) Employer provided childcare: exemptions effective from 6 April 2005
[EIM21995](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM21995) Benefits: exemptions for certain employer provided childcare from 6 April 2005: summary of the new provisions
**Workplace nurseries with effect from 6 April 2005**
[EIM22000](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22000) Benefits: exemptions: workplace nursery provision from 6 April 2005
[EIM22001](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22001) Workplace nursery provision from 6 April 2005
[EIM22002](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22002) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition A
[EIM22003](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22003) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition B
[EIM22004](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22004) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition C
[EIM22005](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22005) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: Condition D
[EIM22006](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22006) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: partnership requirements: premises on which childcare is provided
[EIM22007](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22007) Workplace nurseries from 6 April 2005: responsibility for financing and managing the provision of childcare
**Other employer-supported childcare**
[EIM22010](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22010) Benefits: exemptions: “other childcare” supported by the employer: rules from 6 April 2005
[EIM22011](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22011) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers provided by the employer: rules from 6 April 2005: the exempt amount
[EIM20012](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM20012) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers supported by the employer: rules from 6 April 2011: the exempt amount
[EIM22015](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22015) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: conditions: availability to all employees
[EIM22016](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22016) Benefits: exemptions: other childcare and childcare vouchers: availability to all employees: relevant low-paid employees
**Meaning of important terms**
[EIM22020](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22020) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “child”, “disabled child” and “patient”
[EIM22025](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22025) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “parental responsibility”
[EIM22030](/guidance/employment-income-manual/EIM22030) Benefits: exemptions: childcare and childcare vouchers: rules from 6 April 2005: meaning of “care” and “qualifying childcare”
